duties_responsibilities.duty: Ownership of all critical Salesforce.com processes and key to Sensient’s success.
Serve as the main point of contact for user support inquiries via the ticketing system, Remedyforce.
Provide hands-on virtual training and documentation for users to grow the skill sets across the organization.
Analyze key business and technical processes to provide recommendations for improvements.
Troubleshoot, analyze, and correct all technical issues.
Collaborate with stakeholders to drive high levels of data integrity and operational reliability.
Stay informed on new Salesforce features and functionality, and provide recommendations for process improvements.
Develop solutions for enhancement backlog and large-scale business projects.

education_certification.credential: Minimum 3-5 years of experience in a Salesforce Administrator capacity.
